page.title: 13YOUTH CLUB
page.content: The Gilmerton Youth Club is run by Mr James McKeracher and his wife. The club meets in Monzie Hall twice a week, the 19 juniors between the ages of 7 and 12 on Tuesdays and the 20, or so, seniors between the ages of 13 to 18 on Thursdays. Funds are raised by discos in the hall or in local hotels as well as from sales of home produce, jumble sales and private donations. The club provides a variety of amenities and activities in the Monzie Hall including snooker, table tennis, board games, rounders, netball and five-a-side football. The club is very popular and many children in and around Gilmerton use it regularly.
